name: Water Warehouse
description:
This is a game meant for the Gotm Jam #19, but unfortunately was uploaded 30 seconds too late.... :(((

You want to take a holiday to a desert island, but have nothing to your name...at least not yet. With your little ship and trusty fishing rod, see what kind of curiosities you can scrounge up from the depths to fund your expedition! Use your limited space to stash goods and make quick trades to come out on top!

Your holiday island is waiting for you if you are able to make it through 5 tolls. Each toll appears after every 3 port visits, and they increase in cost!

Controls: 

Move and Jump - Arrow keys 

Pick up / Put down item - Z 

Fish - X 

Throw item - X

Credits:

  • Created by 5ock and Hamezii
  • Thanks to "Adve" and "GhostShip" assets packs on itch.io, as well as a few others
